title: Best Service - Era Medieval Legends [ENGINE 2]
description:
=======[ Info ]======================================================================

Product: Era Medieval Legends
Vendor: Best Service
Format: Engine 2
Website: bestservice.de/en/era_medieval_legends.html

Welcome to Era Medieval Legends another library from Eduardo Tarilonte the maker of renowned libraries like Forest Kingdom, Desert Winds, Epic World and more. Era is a unique sample library featuring a huge set of historical instruments. All you have been waiting for your Medieval, Renaissance or Fantasy musical production in one virtual instrument.

From plucked, wind, reed, bowed, key and percussion multi sampled instruments to an inspiring collection of magical soundscapes to push your music to the next level. With over 10 GB of 44kh-24bits samples, Era features 45 instruments (30 melodic and 15 percussion) and more than 100 soundscapes. A total of 170 patches. One palette of sounds to rule them all!

=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

- Open Engine 2
- Go to Preferences
- Click Library
- Add Library
- Go to your downloaded library's directory
- Select and accept
- Click Save Preferences
- Click OK
- The newly added library will appears on the left panel

=======[ Extra ]=====================================================================

I DO NOT OWN THIS PRODUCT - IF YOU ENJOY IT, PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING TO SUPPORT OWNER!
